creator: zack@grossbart.com
text:
If I run Ant 1.5.1 against JDK 1.3 I sometimes get the following stack trace.  I'm not sure exactly 
how to reproduce, but since this is very easy to fix (probably just catch throwable instead of 
ClassNotFoundException) it seems worth 
doing.

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError: java.lang.SecurityException: 
Prohibited package name: java.lang

	at 
java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:243)
